explanation: [0-0] Inside a room, Spiderman is standing in front of a brown table, facing left. There is a green plate on the right side of the table with a brown hand placed on it. A painting is hung on the blue wall with red blocks, depicting a greyish-black skull with red eyes.
[0-2] Next, Hulk's head emerges from the right side of the table and extends his left hand to take the hand from the plate and disappears. Spiderman's left arm is swinging.
[0-2] Next, Hulk's head emerges from the right side of the table and extends his left hand to take the hand from the plate and disappears. Spiderman's left arm is swinging.

[2-5] Immediately after, Spiderman holds a hand in his right hand, first looks to the right, then turns his head around with a puzzled expression. Subsequently, he shrugs and puts the hand from his right hand into the green plate and looks to the left again.
